body: Reacting to the high ranking of Singapore in the global index of economic freedom, blogger econospeak insists that the prosperous city state is actually a "curious mixture of socialism and state planning with innovative free market approaches."
original_body: Reacting to the high ranking of Singapore in the global index of economic freedom, blogger econospeak insists that the prosperous city state is actually a "curious mixture of socialism and state planning with innovative free market approaches."
title: Singapore's real economy
